abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews The Complete World of Sports (abridged), stage show at the New Victory Theater.
snippet: “The Complete World of Sports (abridged),” a stage show at the New Victory Theater, is proudly directed at the juvenile in sports fans of all ages.
lead_paragraph: “The Complete World of Sports (abridged),” a stage show at the New Victory Theater, is proudly directed at the juvenile in sports fans of all ages.

headline.main: A Comical Analysis of Sports’ Childish Side
